tool_description: Combines all RFP components into professionally formatted document with consistent structure and branding.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the RFP project

document_sections.description: List of sections to include in final document

template_style.description: Document formatting style: formal, modern, government, corporate

table_of_contents.description: Whether to generate table of contents

confidentiality_level.description: Document confidentiality: public, internal, confidential, restricted

contact_information.description: Key contact details for vendor inquiries

submission_format.description: Required submission format: electronic, hard_copy, both

error_messages: Invalid project ID: Project ID must match an existing RFP project.
Missing required sections: Document must include minimum required sections.
Invalid template style: Use formal, modern, government, or corporate.
Too many sections: Document sections cannot exceed maximum limit.
Invalid confidentiality level: Use public, internal, confidential, or restricted.
Invalid submission format: Use electronic, hard_copy, or both.
Missing contact information: At least one contact must be provided when required.
usage: Provide project_id, organization_name, rfp_title, and document_sections array. Customize formatting with template_style and other optional parameters. The tool assembles all components into final RFP document.

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the assembled RFP document

document_structure.description: Final document structure and section order

page_count.description: Total number of pages in the document

completion_status.description: Document assembly status and any warnings

required_attachments.description: List of attachments that need to be included
